name: AaronicBlessing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This is the blessing from Number 6:24-26, sometimes called the Aaronic Blessing, the Priestly Blessing or the Blessing of the Kohanim. May you be blessed in hearing it in Hebrew, the native tongue that it was first uttered in, along with the English after.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
